articles.content: The Miami Heat unraveled badly against an injury-riddled Golden State Warriors team. They let the Warriors, who were without Stephen Curry, Klay Thompson and Draymond Green, light up the third quarte… [+1821 chars]

articles.author: Alyssa Guzman, David Averre
articles.title: Caitlyn Jenner says Lia Thomas is not the 'rightful winner' of NCAA swimming championships - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jenner last night hit out at the NCAA's decision to let Thomas, 22, compete against biological females and recognized second-place Emma Weyant, an Olympic silver medalist, as the true winner.
articles.content: Former Olympic decathlete and gold medal-winner Caitlyn Jenner declared that transgender swimmer Lia Thomas was not the rightful winner of the women's NCAA Championships, instead naming second place … [+12606 chars]
